# MTKViewDelegate

**Protocol**

Methods for responding to a MetalKit view’s drawing and resizing events.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol MTKViewDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Overview

You can set an object that implements the [doc://com.apple.metalkit/documentation/MetalKit/MTKViewDelegate] protocol as a [doc://com.apple.metalkit/documentation/MetalKit/MTKView] object’s delegate. Use a delegate to provide a drawing method to a [doc://com.apple.metalkit/documentation/MetalKit/MTKView] object and respond to rendering events without subclassing the [doc://com.apple.metalkit/documentation/MetalKit/MTKView] class.

## Changing the View’s Layout

- **mtkView(_:drawableSizeWillChange:)**: Updates the view’s contents upon receiving a change in layout, resolution, or size.

## Drawing the View’s Contents

- **draw(in:)**: Draws the view’s contents.

## View Management

- **MTKView**: A specialized view that creates, configures, and displays Metal objects.
